WorkItem.Description: SampleBrowser shows a little red/white message saying "Error occurs: string was not recognized as valid DateTime" then crashes...
WorkItem.Summary: New version crashes with Italian regional settings

Comments.Message:
Hi 

Thank you very much for the issue report!  We have fixed it.  Please reopen the sample browser and you will get the fix automatically. 

Have a great weekend!
Thanks
Jialiang Ge
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework
